channel.title: Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Roadmap
Changelog
item.description: To make it easier for users and contributors to see precisely what notable changes have been made on TravelgateX. All notable changes on TravelgateX platform will be documented in this page. 2018-08-08 GraphQL Schema updated. TGX Headers page Support basic Tracing by request using header TGX-Tracing: 1 Return groups codes in entities queries (accessData,suppierData,clientData,profileData). 2018-07-31 GraphQL Schema updated. Fix IAM mutations Delete member mutation (Delete Apikeys or uninvite user emails) 2018-07-30 Improvements on the organization selector Sorted organizations by alphabetical order.

item.title: GraphQL Schema Changes
item.description: The GraphQL schema change log is a list of recent and upcoming changes to our GraphQL API schema. It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes. Check out this list of new releases and changes applied on the TravelgateX GraphQL API. 2018-08-08 ✅ Input field currency was added to input object type SettingsBaseInput ✅ Field parents was added to object type GroupData ✅ Deprecation reason on field Group.

item.title: GraphQL Schema breaking changes
item.description: Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced Unreleased Removal of organization from PaymentXBookingInfoFilterInput. Reason: Please use PaymentXBookingInfoCriteriaInput. Deprecated on 2018-08-03.Expected removal on 2018-11-01. Removal of pointOfSaleCode from PaymentXBookingInfoFilterInput. Reason: Please use PaymentXBookingInfoCriteriaInput. Deprecated on 2018-08-03.Expected removal on 2018-11-01. Removal of bookingReference from PaymentXBookingInfoFilterInput. Reason: Please use PaymentXBookingInfoCriteriaInput. Deprecated on 2018-08-03.Expected removal on 2018-11-01. Removal of error from Group. Reason: Sustituted by adviseMessage. Deprecated on 2018-08-01.Expected removal on 2018-10-30. Removal of distribute from AddOns.
